thread.title: Britain's best kebab houses in 2017 announced - did your favourite win an award?
thread.title_full: Britain's best kebab houses in 2017 announced - did your favourite win an award?

author: Jo-Anne Rowney
title: Britain's best kebab houses in 2017 announced - did your favourite win an award?
text:
Get daily   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Kebab houses across the UK have crossed skewers and fought it out to take the top spot in the industry 'Oscars'. 
The British Kebab Awards took votes from kebab fans up and down the country to find the most delectable doners in the country. 
Now the top shops have been revealed at a bash held at the Park Plaza Westminster Bridge Hotel, London. 
Kebabs are a British institution with an estimated 1.3million sold every day. Firing up the coals 
Awards ranged from best takeaway to best restaurant and fine dining experience. Did your local kebab shop come up trumps? Here's the full list of winners. 
1. Just Eat Best Delivery: I am Doner, Leeds I am Doner, in Leeds Read More 
Highly Recommended: Irmak BBQ, North Dunstable 
2. Customer Satisfaction: Kosk, Edmonton 
Highly Recommended: Koz Mediterranean Restaurant, Beckenham 
3. Best Newcomer Restaurant/ Takeaway in London: Tarshish, Wood Green 
Highly Recommended: Bababoom, Battersea 
4. Best Newcomer Restaurant/ Takeaway outside London: Elder and Wolf, Whitley Bay It's not about the doner, it's about the real kebabs (Photo: Getty Images) 
5. Best Kebab House in Northern Ireland: Sphinx Glengormley, Glengormley 
6. Best Kebab House in Wales 
Winner: Mezza Luna, Cardiff 
7. Best Kebab House in Scotland 
Winner: Alla Turca, Glasgow
